narration.welcome: Siyakwamukela eNeural Savanna, lapho sifunda i-AI ngobuhlakani base-Afrika.
narration.lesson1: Ngendlela ye-Ubuntu, siqala uhambo lwethu ndawonye. Namhlanje sifunda ngama-neural networks ngobuhlakani bomuthi we-acacia.
narration.lesson2: Njengemizimba yomuthi we-baobab, ama-neural networks axhuma futhi abelane ngolwazi. Sikhula sinamandla ndawonye.
narration.lesson3: Ibhubesi lizingela ngobekezeli nangamasu. Kanjalo nathi kufanele sibhekane ne-machine learning ngobuhlakani nangokunakekela.
narration.lesson4: Amanzi ageleza njengedatha kumanethiwekhi ethu. Iqolo ngalinye liba negalelo ekugelezweni kolwazi.
narration.lesson5: Indlovu ayikhohlwa, futhi nama-neural networks ethu akakhohlwa. Inkumbulo isisekelo sokufunda.
